title: Charming Renovated Family House in Krosno's Old Town – Perfect for Students!
description: This welcoming, recently renovated family house offers three spacious bedrooms and three modern bathrooms, providing comfortable living for families or student groups alike. The sunlit interior pairs classic touches with contemporary updates, creating a warm, inviting atmosphere throughout. Enjoy the large terrace for gatherings, a balcony overlooking the lush yard, and a dedicated barbecue zone for relaxing evenings. The home measures a generous 165 m8, providing plenty of room for study, play, and rest.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the heart of Krosno's picturesque Old Town, this property is set in a peaceful, safe, community-oriented area beloved for its historic charm. The neighborhood is ideal for outdoor activities, being close to beautiful parks and modern playgrounds. All essential amenities, from local shops to cozy cafes, are just a short stroll away.
lifestyle_benefits: minutes to green parks and playgrounds
all essentials within easy walking distance
target_buyer: Perfect for students attending local schools or universities who value space, comfort, and a community-driven environment. Families looking for a safe, well-connected location near parks and amenities will also find this home ideal.
market_positioning: Well-positioned within Krosno's scenic Old Town, this home offers above-average space and renovation quality at a competitive price point, making it an excellent choice for students or families seeking outstanding value and lifestyle advantages in a historic setting.
